body: Several familiars belonging to members of your Cabal are causing problems with each other or with local animals. You must succeed at a DC 25 Diplomacy, Handle Animal, or Knowledge (arcana) check, or spend 1d4 points of Goods and Influence (divided as you see fit) to calm things down.
name: Familiar Scraps
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Downtime Events/Organization Events/Cabal Events/Familiar Scraps
